attributes.action: To remove all unnecessary training by the NHS for Covid vaccinators
attributes.additional_details: Because it will save lives and take the pressure off the NHS and stop the hospital  staff being overwhelmed and get the economy back to normal.
attributes.background: To remove the excessive training and allow all practitioners with previous experience of injection skills to come forward speedily .

rejection.details: The training recommendations for Covid-19 vaccinators are set by Public Health England, and the application process for joining the NHS Covid-19 vaccinaton team is managed by the NHS. Both Public Health England and the NHS are operationally independent of the Government, and decisions about this guidance and recruitment are matters for them, not the Government or House of Commons.
